name: Forgotten land (itch) (Mathieu Derrit, Antoine MAGNIN)
description:
Forgotten land (itch) (Mathieu Derrit, Antoine MAGNIN) is an adventure, puzzle and platformer game developed by Mathieu Derrit and Antoine MAGNIN. It was originally released in 2023.
Forgotten land (itch) (Mathieu Derrit, Antoine MAGNIN) is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
